description.value: Your bird half is that of a prey animal, and it marks you. You lose your Strength boost but also your Charisma flaw. When casting divine spells or effects, the DC is given a circumstance bonus of 1.

source.value: Ponyfinder: Races of Everglow Second Edition

rules.text: Prey Aspect When casting divine spells or effects, the DC is given a circumstance bonus of 1.
